entry.title: [SQ] I dislike earbuds with earplug-nipple-things. It seems like the brands that didn
entry.content: I dislike earbuds with earplug-nipple-things. It seems like the brands that didn't use them might be moving in that direction, though. What's a reliable no-plug wireless earbud brand? Preferably cheap and unlikely to disappear in the next x years?
